abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.
abilities.notes: Applies multiple stuns and damage instances over time.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.description: Transforms a creep or lesser life form into three fragments of Enigma himself. These fragments are known as Eidolons. When Eidolons attack 8 times, they multiply, creating a new Eidolon. They last for 35 seconds.
abilities.notes: Eidolons multiply after 8 attacks. Cannot target ancient creeps or heroes.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging all enemies caught in it based on their max health.
abilities.notes: Deals pure damage based on max health. Goes through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: Enigma creates a vortex that sucks in nearby enemies, stunning, damaging and pulling them to its center. The vortex is too powerful for even the strongest units to escape.
abilities.notes: Requires channeling. Pulls and stuns all units in the area.
